verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> about אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> and to his sons וְיִנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <WH5144> that they separate מִקָּדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> themselves from the holy things בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְחַלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> and that they profane אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> not my holy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֵ֧ם <WH1992> they מַקְדִּשִׁ֛ים <WH6942> [in those things] which they hallow לִ֖י אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto me I [am] the LORD

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> throughout לְדֹרֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1755> among your generations כָּל־ <WH3605> any אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> unto them Whosoever אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> that goeth מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all זַרְעֲכֶ֗ם <WH2233> [he be] of all your seed אֶל־ <WH413> about הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> unto the holy things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַקְדִּ֤ישׁוּ <WH6942> hallow בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <WH2932> having his uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> upon him that soul הַהִ֛וא <WH1931> he מִלְּפָנַ֖י <WH6440> from my presence אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> What man soever אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> or a man מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> of the seed אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> of Aaron וְה֤וּא <WH1931> who צָר֙וּעַ֙ <WH6879> [is] a leper א֣וֹ <WH176> or זָ֔ב <WH2100> or hath a running issue בַּקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> of the holy things לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֹאכַ֔ל <WH398> he shall not eat עַ֖ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יִטְהָ֑ר <WH2891> until he be clean וְהַנֹּגֵ֙עַ֙ <WH5060> And whoso toucheth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> anything טְמֵא־ <WH2931> any thing [that is] unclean נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> [by] the dead א֣וֹ <WH176> or אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> goeth מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> emission זָֽרַע׃ <WH2233> of the descendants

אוֹ־ <WH176> or אִישׁ֙ <WH376> Or whosoever אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִגַּ֔ע <WH5060> toucheth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any שֶׁ֖רֶץ <WH8318> any creeping thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יִטְמָא־ <WH2930> whereby he may be made unclean ל֑וֹ א֤וֹ <WH176> or בְאָדָם֙ <WH120> or a man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יִטְמָא־ <WH2930> of whom he may take uncleanness ל֔וֹ לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> whatever טֻמְאָתֽוֹ׃ <WH2932> whatsoever uncleanness

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <WH5315> The soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who תִּגַּע־ <WH5060> which hath touched בּ֔וֹ וְטָמְאָ֖ה <WH2930> any such shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until even וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> and shall not יֹאכַל֙ <WH398> and shall not eat מִן־ <WH4480> at הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> of the holy things כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> unless רָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> he wash בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> his flesh בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> with water

וּבָ֥א <WH935> is down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> And when the sun וְטָהֵ֑ר <WH2891> he shall be clean וְאַחַר֙ <WH310> and shall afterward יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> eat מִן־ <WH4480> at הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <WH6944> of the holy things כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לַחְמ֖וֹ <WH3899> because it [is] his food הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

נְבֵלָ֧ה <WH5038> That which dieth of itself וּטְרֵפָ֛ה <WH2966> or is torn לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> [with beasts] he shall not eat לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> to defile בָ֑הּ אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> himself therewith I [am] the LORD

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> They shall therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֗י <WH4931> mine ordinance וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> they will not יִשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> lest they bear עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> because חֵ֔טְא <WH2399> sin וּמֵ֥תוּ <WH4191> for it and die ב֖וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> because יְחַלְּלֻ֑הוּ <WH2490> therefore if they profane אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> do sanctify

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all manner זָ֖ר <WH2114> There shall no stranger לֹא־ <WH3808> No יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> eat קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [of] the holy thing תּוֹשַׁ֥ב <WH8453> a sojourner כֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> of the priest וְשָׂכִ֖יר <WH7916> or an hired servant לֹא־ <WH3808> No יֹ֥אכַל <WH398> shall not eat קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> [of] the holy thing

וְכֹהֵ֗ן <WH3548> But if the priest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יִקְנֶ֥ה <WH7069> buy נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> [any] soul קִנְיַ֣ן <WH7075> with כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <WH3701> his money ה֖וּא <WH1931> one יֹ֣אכַל <WH398> he shall eat בּ֑וֹ וִילִ֣יד <WH3211> of it and he that is born בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> in his house הֵ֖ם <WH1992> and those יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> they shall eat בְלַחְמֽוֹ׃ <WH3899> of his meat

וּבַת־ <WH1323> daughter כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> If the priest's כִּ֥י <WH3588> If תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he זָ֑ר <WH2114> to a layman הִ֕וא <WH1931> he בִּתְרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> of an offering הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> of the holy things לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> she may not eat

וּבַת־ <WH1323> daughter כֹּהֵן֩ <WH3548> But if the priest's כִּ֨י <WH3588> if תִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> becomes אַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> be a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֗ה <WH1644> or divorced וְזֶרַע֮ <WH2233> and have no child אֵ֣ין <WH369> and has לָהּ֒ וְשָׁבָ֞ה <WH7725> and is returned אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> unto her father's כִּנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> as in her youth מִלֶּ֥חֶם <WH3899> meat אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> of her father's תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> she shall eat וְכָל־ <WH3605> all manner זָ֖ר <WH2114> but there shall no stranger לֹא־ <WH3808> not יֹ֥אכַל <WH398> eat בּֽוֹ׃ ס

וְאִ֕ישׁ <WH376> And if a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> eat קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [of] the holy thing בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <WH7684> unwittingly וְיָסַ֤ף <WH3254> then he shall put חֲמִֽשִׁיתוֹ֙ <WH2549> the fifth עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> of וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> [part] thereof unto it and shall give לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> [it] unto the priest אֶת־ <WH854> for הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> with the holy thing

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <WH2490> And they shall not profane אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> the holy things בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָרִ֖ימוּ <WH7311> which they offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהִשִּׂ֤יאוּ <WH5375> Or suffer them to bear אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity אַשְׁמָ֔ה <WH819> of trespass בְּאָכְלָ֖ם <WH398> when they eat אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH6944> their holy things כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> do sanctify פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> and to his sons וְאֶל֙ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto them Whatsoever אִישׁ֩ <WH376> man מִבֵּ֨ית <WH1004> [he be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> or הַגֵּ֣ר <WH1616> or of the strangers בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יַקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> that will offer קָרְבָּנוֹ֙ <WH7133> his oblation לְכָל־ <WH3605> is any נִדְרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5088> for all his vows וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> any נִדְבוֹתָ֔ם <WH5071> and for all his freewill offerings אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> which they will offer לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering

לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֑ם <WH7522> [Ye shall offer] at your own will תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> without blemish זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> a male בַּבָּקָ֕ר <WH1241> of the beeves בַּכְּשָׂבִ֖ים <WH3775> of the sheep וּבָֽעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> or of the goats

כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֥וֹ מ֖וּם <WH3971> [But] whatsoever hath a blemish לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַקְרִ֑יבוּ <WH7126> [that] shall ye not offer כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not לְרָצ֖וֹן <WH7522> for it shall not be acceptable יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And whosoever כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יַקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> offereth זֶֽבַח־ <WH2077> a sacrifice שְׁלָמִים֙ <WH8002> of peace offerings לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God לְפַלֵּא־ <WH6381> to accomplish נֶ֙דֶר֙ <WH5088> [his] vow א֣וֹ <WH176> or לִנְדָבָ֔ה <WH5071> or a freewill offering בַּבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> in beeves א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> or sheep תָּמִ֤ים <WH8549> it shall be perfect יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become לְרָצ֔וֹן <WH7522> to be accepted כָּל־ <WH3605> shall be no מ֖וּם <WH3971> there shall be no blemish לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בּֽוֹ׃

עַוֶּרֶת֩ <WH5788> Blind א֨וֹ <WH176> or שָׁב֜וּר <WH7665> or broken אוֹ־ <WH176> or חָר֣וּץ <WH2782> or maimed אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or יַבֶּ֗לֶת <WH2990> or having a wen א֤וֹ <WH176> or גָרָב֙ <WH1618> or scurvy א֣וֹ <WH176> or יַלֶּ֔פֶת <WH3217> or scabbed לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תַקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> ye shall not offer אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> another לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> these unto the LORD וְאִשֶּׁ֗ה <WH801> an offering by fire לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> nor make מֵהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of them upon the altar לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְשׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> Either a bullock וָשֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> or a lamb שָׂר֣וּעַ <WH8311> that hath any thing superfluous וְקָל֑וּט <WH7038> or lacking in his parts נְדָבָה֙ <WH5071> [for] a freewill offering תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> that mayest thou offer אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וּלְנֵ֖דֶר <WH5088> but for a vow לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> it shall not be accepted

וּמָע֤וּךְ <WH4600> that which is bruised וְכָתוּת֙ <WH3807> or crushed וְנָת֣וּק <WH5423> or broken וְכָר֔וּת <WH3772> or cut לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַקְרִ֖יבוּ <WH7126> Ye shall not offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּֽבְאַרְצְכֶ֖ם <WH776> [any offering thereof] in your land לֹ֥א <WH3808> or תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> neither shall ye make

וּמִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> the hand בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <WH5236> Neither from a stranger's לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תַקְרִ֛יבוּ <WH7126> shall ye offer אֶת־ <WH853> לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> of your God מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> such כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מָשְׁחָתָ֤ם <WH4893> of any of these because their corruption בָּהֶם֙ מ֣וּם <WH3971> [is] in them [and] blemishes בָּ֔ם לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יֵרָצ֖וּ <WH7521> [be] in them they shall not be accepted לָכֶֽם׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> When a bullock אוֹ־ <WH176> or כֶ֤שֶׂב <WH3775> or a sheep אוֹ־ <WH176> or עֵז֙ <WH5795> or a goat כִּ֣י <WH3588> When יִוָּלֵ֔ד <WH3205> is brought forth וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> shall remain שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> then it shall be seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> under the dam וּמִיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <WH8066> and from the eighth וָהָ֔לְאָה <WH1973> and thenceforth יֵרָצֶ֕ה <WH7521> it shall be accepted לְקָרְבַּ֥ן <WH7133> for an offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְשׁ֖וֹר <WH7794> And [whether it be] cow אוֹ־ <WH176> or שֶׂ֑ה <WH7716> or ewe אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> it and her young לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> ye shall not kill בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> both in one

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When תִזְבְּח֥וּ <WH2076> And when ye will offer זֶֽבַח־ <WH2077> a sacrifice תּוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> of thanksgiving לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <WH7522> [it] at your own will תִּזְבָּֽחוּ׃ <WH2076> offer
